name: Sobada Polpala
short_description: Natural Dehydrated Flower With Diuretic Actions
description:
Polpala (Aerva lanata) is drunk early in the morning to cleanse the kidneys. The polpala drink has become an everyday beverage in rural Sri Lanka. The drink is recommended for pregnant women because it helps maintain the body’s metabolism.
  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
